attributes.action: encourage people to get their five a day by cutting taxation on healthy fruit smoothies and juices to 5%.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment, all food (including things like hotdogs and crisps) is subject to a zero rate of tax. But people who want to make a healthy choice and buy smoothies and juices get taxed 17.5% VAT.

It's a simple step, and, as more and more people get their fruit in liquid form, it could make a big difference. Our research shows that at least 500 million more portions of fruit would be consumed each year if this happened. Since we all know that eating more fruit and veg is essential to being healthier, it makes sense to help people make positive choices.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "encourage people to get their five a day by cutting taxation on healthy fruit smoothies and juices to 5%."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15386.asp

Prime Minister's Office
